text: d*ib@rey<PAS> qohE<MUN>lEt b*En=d*Awi<ZQP>d mE<TIP>lEk@ b*iyr<SIL>w*SAlA<SIL>im:
h<HPA>be<MEH>l h<HPA>bAliym<PAS> 'Ama<MUN>r qohE<ZQP>lEt h<HPA>be<MER>l h<HPA>bAli<TIP>ym hak*o<MER>l hA<SIL>bEl:
mah=y*it@r<TIP>w^on lA<SIL>'AdA<ATN>m b*@kA<AZL>l=`<HPA>mAl<ZQP>w^o SE<SIL>y*a`<HPA>mo<TIP>l t*a<MER>xat haW/*.A<SIL>mES:
d*<MEH>w^or holek@<PAS> w@d<MUN>w^or b*A<ZQP>' w@hA'A<TIP>rEY l@`w^olA<MER>m `omA<SIL>dEt:
w@zAra<MER>x haW/*.E<TIP>mES w*bA<MUN>' haW/*.A<ATN>mES w@'E<AZL>l=m@qw^om<ZQP>w^o Sw^o'e<TEB>p zw^ore<MER>xa<SIL> h<TIP>w*' SA<SIL>m:
hw^olek@<PAS> 'El=d*Ar<ZQP>w^om w@sw^obe<TIP>b 'El=YAp<ATN>w^on sw^obe<MEH>b | sobeb<PAS> hw^ole<MUN>k@ hAr<ZQP>w*xa w@`al=s@bi<SIL>ybotA<TIP>yw SA<MER>b hAr<SIL>w*xa:

k*Al=han*@xAliym<PAS> ho<SIL>l@ki<MUN>ym 'El=hay*A<ZQP>m w@hay*A<TIP>m 'eynE<MUN>n*w* mAle<ATN>' 'El=m@q<RBM>w^om SE<MEH>han*@xAliym<PAS> ho<SIL>l@ki<ZQP>ym SA<TEB>m he<MER>m SAbi<TIP>ym lAlA<SIL>kEt:
k*Al=had*@bAri<MUN>ym y@ge`i<ZQP>ym lo<SIL>'=yw*ka<MER>l 'i<TIP>yS l@dab*e<ATN>r lo<SIL>'=tiW@b*a<MER>` `a<AZL>yin<PAS> lir@'<ZQP>w^ot w@lo<SIL>'=tim*Ale<MER>' 'o<TIP>zEn miW/*.@mo<SIL>`a:
mah=W/*.E<SIL>hAyAh<PAS> h<MUN>w*' SEy*i<SIL>h@yE<ZQP>h w*mah=W/*.En*a<SIL>`<HPA>WA<ZQP>h h<TIP>w*' SEy*e<SIL>`AWE<ATN>h w@'e<MER>yn k*Al=xAdA<TIP>S t*a<MER>xat haW/*.A<SIL>mES:
ye<MER>S d*AbA<TEB>r SEy*o'ma<MER>r r@'eh=zE<TIP>h xAdA<MUN>S h<ATN>w*' k*@bAr<PAS> hAyA<MUN>h l@`o<SIL>lAmi<ZQP>ym '<HPA>SE<MER>r hAyA<TIP>h mil*@pAne<SIL>nw*:

'e<MER>yn zik@r<TIP>w^on lAri<SIL>'Soni<ATN>ym w@ga<AZL>m lA'a<SIL>x<HPA>roni<GER>ym SEy*i<SIL>h@y<RBM>w* lo<SIL>'=yih@yE<MEH>h lAhEm<PAS> zik*Ar<ZQP>w^on `i<MER>m SEy*i<SIL>h@y<TIP>w* lA'a<SIL>x<HPA>ronA<SIL>h:
'<HPA>ni<MUN>y qohE<RBM>lEt hAyi<MER>ytiy mE<TEB>lEk@ `al=yiW@rA'e<TIP>l b*iyr<SIL>w*SAlA<SIL>im:

w@nAta<MUN>t*iy 'Et=lib*i<RBM>y lid@r<MEH>w^oS w@lAtw*r<PAS> b*a<SIL>xAk@mA<ZQP>h `a<TEB>l k*Al='<HPA>SE<MER>r na<SIL>`<HPA>WA<TIP>h t*a<MUN>xat haW/*.AmA<ATN>yim h<MUN>w*' | `in@ya<MUN>n rA<RBM>` nAta<DAR>n '<HSE>lohi<TEB>ym lib@ne<MER>y hA<SIL>'AdA<TIP>m la<SIL>`<HPA>n<MER>w^ot b*<SIL>w^o:
rA'i<AZL>ytiy<PAS> 'Et=k*Al=ha<SIL>m*a`<HPA>Wi<ZQP>ym SE<SIL>n*a`<HPA>W<TIP>w* t*a<MUN>xat haW/*.A<ATN>mES w@hin*e<MER>h hak*o<TEB>l hE<TIP>bEl w*r@`<MER>w*t r<SIL>w*xa:
m@`uw*A<TIP>t lo<SIL>'=yw*ka<MUN>l lit@qo<ATN>n w@xEs@r<TIP>w^on lo<SIL>'=yw*ka<MER>l l@him*An<SIL>w^ot:

d*ib*a<AZL>r@t*iy '<HPA>ni<MEH>y `im=lib*iy<PAS> le'mo<ZQP>r '<HPA>ni<RBM>y hin*e<AZL>h hig@d*a<MEH>l@t*iy w@hw^osa<AZL>p@t*iy<PAS> xAk@mA<ZQP>h `a<TEB>l k*Al='<HPA>SEr=hAyA<MER>h l@pAna<TIP>y `al=y@r<SIL>w*SAlA<ATN>im w@lib*i<TEB>y rA'A<MER>h har@b*e<TIP>h xAk@mA<MER>h wAdA<SIL>`at:
wA<SIL>'Et*@nA<MEH>h lib*iy<PAS> lAda<MUN>`at xAk@mA<ZQP>h w@da<MER>`at h<SIL>w^olelo<TIP>t w@Wik@l<ATN>w*t yAda<ZQM>`@t*iy SEg*am=zE<MER>h h<TIP>w*' ra`@y<MER>w^on r<SIL>w*xa:
k*i<TEB>y b*@ro<MER>b xAk@mA<TIP>h rAb=k*A<ATN>`as w@yw^osi<MER>yp d*a<TIP>`at yw^osi<MER>yp mak@'<SIL>w^ob:
'Ama<MEH>r@t*i<SIL>y '<HPA>niy<PAS> b*@lib*i<ZQP>y l@kAh=n*A<TEB>' '<HPA>nas*@kA<MER>h b@Wim@xA<TIP>h w*r@'e<MUN>h b@T<ATN>w^ob w@hin*e<MER>h gam=h<TIP>w*' hA<SIL>bEl:
liW@x<TIP>w^oq 'Ama<MUN>r@t*iy m@hw^olA<ATN>l w*l@Wim@xA<TIP>h mah=z*o<MER>h `oWA<SIL>h:

t*a<MUN>r@t*iy b@lib*i<ZQP>y lim@S<MER>w^ok@ b*ay*a<TIP>yin 'Et=b*@WAri<ATN>y w@lib*i<GAR>y nohe<MEH>g b*a<SIL>xAk@mAh<PAS> w@lE<SIL>'<HSE>xo<MUN>z b*@sik@l<ZQP>w*t `a<MUN>d '<HPA>SEr='Er@'E<RBM>h 'ey=zE<AZL>h T<GER>w^ob lib@ne<MEH>y hA<SIL>'AdAm<PAS> '<HPA>SE<MEH>r ya<SIL>`<HPA>Ww*<PAS> t*a<MUN>xat haW/*.Ama<ZQP>yim mis@p*a<TIP>r y@me<MER>y xay*eyhE<SIL>m:
hig@d*a<TIP>l@t*iy ma<SIL>`<HPA>WA<ATN>y b*Ani<MEH>ytiy liy<PAS> b*At*i<ZQP>ym nATa<MER>`@t*iy li<TIP>y k*@rAmi<SIL>ym:
`AWi<MUN>ytiy li<ZQP>y g*an*<TIP>w^ot w*par@d*esi<ATN>ym w@nATa<MER>`@t*iy bAhE<TIP>m `e<MER>Y k*Al=p*E<SIL>riy:
`AWi<MER>ytiy li<TIP>y b*@rek<MUN>w^ot mA<ATN>yim l@haS@q<MUN>w^ot mehE<ZQP>m ya<TIP>`ar Yw^ome<MER>xa `eYi<SIL>ym:

qAni<AZL>ytiy<PAS> `<HPA>bAdi<MUN>ym w*S@pAx<ZQP>w^ot w*b@ney=ba<TIP>yit hA<MUN>yAh li<ATN>y g*a<MUN>m miq@nEh<TLP> bAqA<AZL>r wAYo<MEH>'n har@b*eh<PAS> hA<MUN>yAh li<ZQP>y mik*o<TEB>l SE<SIL>hAy<MER>w* l@pAna<TIP>y b*iyr<SIL>w*SAlA<SIL>im:

k*Ana<MEH>s@t*iy liy<PAS> g*am=k*E<MUN>sEp w@zAhA<ZQP>b w*s@gul*a<MER>t m@lAki<TIP>ym w@ham*@diyn<ATN>w^ot `AWi<AZL>ytiy li<GER>y SAri<MUN>ym w@SAr<RBM>w^ot w@ta<SIL>`<HPA>nug<TEB>w^ot b*@ne<MER>y hA<SIL>'AdA<TIP>m Sid*A<MER>h w@Sid*<SIL>w^ot:
w@gAda<MUN>l@t*iy w@hw^osa<ZQP>p@t*iy mik*o<TEB>l SE<SIL>hAyA<MER>h l@pAna<TIP>y b*iyr<SIL>w*SAlA<ATN>im 'a<MER>p xAk@mAti<TIP>y `A<MER>m@dAh l*i<SIL>y:

w@kol<PAS> '<HPA>SE<MUN>r SA<SIL>'<HPA>l<MUN>w* `eyna<ZQP>y lo<MER>' 'AYa<TIP>l@t*iy mehE<ATN>m lo<SIL>'=mAna<AZL>`@t*iy 'Et=lib*i<GER>y mik*Al=Wim@xA<RBM>h k*i<SIL>y=lib*i<MEH>y WAme<AZL>xa<PAS> mik*Al=`<HPA>mAli<ZQP>y w@zE<SIL>h=hAyA<MER>h xEl@qi<TIP>y mik*Al=`<HPA>mAli<SIL>y:

w*pAni<MUN>yti<SIL>y '<HPA>ni<RBM>y b*@kAl=ma<SIL>`<HPA>Way<PAS> SE<SIL>`AW<MUN>w* yAda<ZQP>y w*bE<SIL>`AmA<TIP>l SE<SIL>`Ama<MUN>l@t*iy la<SIL>`<HPA>W<ATN>w^ot w@hin*e<AZL>h hak*o<MER>l hE<AZL>bEl<PAS> w*r@`<MUN>w*t r<ZQP>w*xa w@'e<MER>yn yit@r<TIP>w^on t*a<MER>xat haW/*.A<SIL>mES:

w*pAni<MEH>yti<SIL>y '<HPA>niy<PAS> lir@'<MUN>w^ot xAk@mA<ZQP>h w@h<SIL>w^olel<TIP>w^ot w@sik@l<ATN>w*t k*i<MUN>y | mE<MUN>h hA<SIL>'AdA<RBM>m SEy*Abw^o'<PAS> 'a<SIL>x<HPA>re<MUN>y ham*E<ZQP>lEk@ 'e<MER>t '<HPA>SEr=k*@bA<TIP>r `AW<SIL>w*hw*:
w@rA'i<MUN>ytiy 'A<ZQP>niy SEy*e<MER>S yit@r<TEB>w^on la<SIL>xAk@mA<TIP>h min=has*ik@l<ATN>w*t k*i<SIL>yt@r<MER>w^on hA'<TIP>w^or min=haxo<SIL>SEk@:
hE<SIL>xAkAm<PAS> `eynA<MUN>yw b*@ro'S<ZQP>w^o w@hak*@si<TIP>yl b*axo<MUN>SEk@ hw^ole<ATN>k@ w@yAda<MUN>`@t*iy gam='A<ZQP>niy SEm*iq@rE<MER>h 'ExA<TIP>d yiq@rE<MER>h 'Et=k*ul*A<SIL>m:

w@'Ama<AZL>r@t*i<SIL>y '<HPA>ni<GER>y b*@lib*i<RBM>y k*@miq@re<MEH>h hak*@siyl<PAS> g*am='<HPA>ni<MUN>y yiq@re<ZQP>niy w@lA<DAR>m*Ah xAka<TEB>m@t*iy '<HPA>ni<TIP>y 'A<MUN>z yote<ATN>r w@dib*a<MUN>r@t*iy b@lib*i<ZQP>y SEg*am=zE<TIP>h hA<SIL>bEl:

k*iy<TLP> 'e<AZL>yn zik@r<DAR>w^on lE<SIL>xAkA<TEB>m `i<SIL>m=hak*@si<TIP>yl l@`w^olA<ATN>m b*@SEk*@bA<GAR>r hay*Ami<MEH>ym hab*A'iym<PAS> hak*o<MUN>l niS@k*A<ZQP>x w@'e<TEB>yk@ yAm<MER>w*t hE<SIL>xAkA<TIP>m `i<SIL>m=hak*@si<SIL>yl:

w@WAne<AZL>'tiy<PAS> 'Et=ha<MUN>xay*i<ZQP>ym k*i<MUN>y ra<MEH>` `Alay<PAS> ha<SIL>m*a`<HPA>WE<ZQP>h SEn*a<SIL>`<HPA>WA<TIP>h t*a<MUN>xat haW/*.A<ATN>mES k*i<SIL>y=hak*o<MER>l hE<TIP>bEl w*r@`<MER>w*t r<SIL>w*xa:

w@WAne<MEH>'ti<SIL>y '<HPA>niy<PAS> 'Et=k*Al=`<HPA>mAli<ZQP>y SE<SIL>'<HPA>ni<MER>y `Ame<TIP>l t*a<MUN>xat haW/*.A<ATN>mES SE<MUN>'an*iyxE<ZQP>n*w* lA<SIL>'AdA<TIP>m SEy*i<SIL>h@yE<MER>h 'a<SIL>x<HPA>rA<SIL>y:

w*mi<MUN>y yw^ode<RBM>`a hE<SIL>xAkA<MEH>m yi<SIL>h@yEh<PAS> '<MUN>w^o sAkA<ZQP>l w@yiS@laT<PAS> b*@kAl=`<HPA>mAli<ZQP>y SE<SIL>`Ama<MER>l@t*iy w@SE<SIL>xAka<TIP>m@t*iy t*a<MUN>xat haW/*.A<ATN>mES g*am=zE<TIP>h hA<SIL>bEl:
w@sab*<MER>w^oti<SIL>y '<HPA>ni<TIP>y l@ya'e<MUN>S 'Et=lib*i<ATN>y `a<YET>l k*Al=hE<MUN>`AmA<ZQP>l SE<SIL>`Ama<TIP>l@t*iy t*a<MER>xat haW/*.A<SIL>mES:

k*iy=ye<MUN>S 'AdA<RBM>m SE<SIL>`<HPA>mAl<TEB>w^o b*@xAk@mA<MER>h w*b@da<TIP>`at w*b@kiS@r<ATN>w^on w*l@'AdA<GAR>m SEl*o<MEH>' `A<SIL>mal=b*w^o<PAS> yit*@nE<MUN>n*w* xEl@q<ZQP>w^o g*am=zE<MER>h hE<TIP>bEl w@rA`A<MER>h rab*A<SIL>h:
k*i<TLM>y mE<SIL>h=howE<MEH>h lA<SIL>'AdAm<PAS> b*@kAl=`<HPA>mAl<ZQP>w^o w*b@ra`@y<TIP>w^on lib*<ATN>w^o S@h<MER>w*' `Ame<TIP>l t*a<MER>xat haW/*.A<SIL>mES:
k*i<DAR>y kAl=yAmA<MUN>yw mak@'obi<RBM>ym wAka<AZL>`as<PAS> `in@yAn<ZQP>w^o g*am=b*al*a<TIP>y@lAh lo<SIL>'=SAka<MUN>b lib*<ATN>w^o g*am=zE<TIP>h hE<MER>bEl h<SIL>w*':

'e<SIL>yn=T<MEH>w^ob b*A<SIL>'AdAm<PAS> SEy*o'ka<MUN>l w@SAtA<ZQP>h w@hEr@'A<DAR>h 'Et=nap@S<TEB>w^o T<TIP>w^ob b*a<SIL>`<HPA>mAl<ATN>w^o g*am=zoh<PAS> rA'i<MUN>ytiy 'A<ZQP>niy k*i<TEB>y miy*a<MER>d hA<SIL>'<HSE>lohi<TIP>ym hi<SIL>y':
k*i<MUN>y mi<MER>y yo'ka<TEB>l w*mi<MER>y yAx<TIP>w*S x<MER>w*Y mim*E<SIL>n*iy:

k*i<MEH>y l@'AdAm<PAS> SET*<MUN>w^ob l@pAnA<ZQP>yw nAta<TEB>n xAk@mA<MER>h w@da<TIP>`at w@Wim@xA<ATN>h w@la<SIL>xw^oTE'<TLP> nAta<AZL>n `in@yA<GER>n lE<SIL>'<HSE>so<MUN>p w@lik@n<RBM>w^os lAtet<PAS> l@Tw^ob<PAS> lip@ne<MUN>y hA<SIL>'<HSE>lohi<ZQP>ym g*am=zE<MER>h hE<TIP>bEl w*r@`<MER>w*t r<SIL>w*xa:
lak*o<TIP>l z@mA<ATN>n w@`e<MER>t l@kAl=xe<TIP>pEY t*a<MER>xat haW/*.AmA<SIL>yim:
`e<MER>t lAlE<TIP>dEt        w@`e<MUN>t lAm<ATN>w*t _           `e<MUN>t lATa<ZQP>`at        w@`e<TIP>t la<SIL>`<HPA>q<MER>w^or nAT<SIL>w*`a: _
`e<MEH>t la<SIL>h<HPA>rw^og<PAS>        w@`e<MUN>t lir@p*<ZQP>w^o' _           `e<MER>t lip@r<TIP>w^oY        w@`e<MER>t lib@n<SIL>w^ot: _
`e<MEH>t lib@k*w^ot<PAS>          w@`e<MUN>t liW@x<ZQP>w^oq _           `e<MER>t s@p<TIP>w^od         w@`e<MER>t r@q<SIL>w^od: _
`e<YET>t l@haS@li<MUN>yk@ '<HPA>bAni<ZQP>ym        w@`e<TIP>t k*@n<MUN>w^os '<HPA>bAni<ATN>ym _           `e<MUN>t la<SIL>x<HPA>b<ZQP>w^oq         w@`e<TIP>t lir@xo<MER>q me<SIL>xab*e<SIL>q: _
`e<MEH>t l@baq*eS<PAS>         w@`e<MUN>t l@'ab*e<ZQP>d _           `e<MER>t liS@m<TIP>w^or        w@`e<MER>t l@haS@li<SIL>yk@: _
`e<MEH>t liq@r<AZL>w^o`a<PAS>        w@`e<MUN>t lit@p*<ZQP>w^or _           `e<MER>t la<SIL>x<HPA>S<TIP>w^ot        w@`e<MER>t l@dab*e<SIL>r: _
`e<MEH>t lE<SIL>'<HSE>hob<PAS>         w@`e<MUN>t liW@no<ZQP>' _           `e<MER>t mil@xAmA<TIP>h        w@`e<MER>t SAl<SIL>w^om:
mah=y*it@rw^on<PAS> hA<SIL>`w^oWE<ZQP>h b*a<SIL>'<HPA>SE<TIP>r h<MER>w*' `Ame<SIL>l:
rA'i<MUN>ytiy 'Et=hA<SIL>`in@yA<RBM>n '<HPA>SE<AZL>r nAta<DAR>n '<HSE>lohi<TEB>ym lib@ne<MER>y hA<SIL>'AdA<TIP>m la<SIL>`<HPA>n<MER>w^ot b*<SIL>w^o:

'Et=hak*o<MER>l `AWA<TIP>h yApE<MUN>h b@`it*<ATN>w^o g*a<MEH>m 'Et=hA<SIL>`olAm<PAS> nAta<MUN>n b*@lib*A<ZQP>m mib*@li<GAR>y '<HPA>SE<DAR>r lo<SIL>'=yim@YA<MUN>' hA<SIL>'AdA<RBM>m 'Et=ha<SIL>m*a`<HPA>WE<TEB>h '<HPA>SEr=`AWA<MER>h hA<SIL>'<HSE>lohi<TIP>ym mero<MER>'S w@`ad=s<SIL>w^op:
yAda<ZQM>`@t*iy k*i<TEB>y 'e<MER>yn T<TIP>w^ob b*A<ATN>m k*i<MUN>y 'im=liW@m<ZQP>w^oxa w@la<SIL>`<HPA>W<MER>w^ot T<TIP>w^ob b*@xay*A<SIL>yw:
w@ga<MEH>m k*Al=hA<SIL>'AdAm<PAS> SEy*o'ka<MUN>l w@SAtA<ZQP>h w@rA'A<MER>h T<TIP>w^ob b*@kAl=`<HPA>mAl<ATN>w^o mat*a<MER>t '<HSE>lohi<TIP>ym hi<SIL>y':

yAda<RBM>`@t*iy k*i<TLM>y k*Al='<HPA>SE<AZL>r ya<SIL>`<HPA>WE<MEH>h hA<SIL>'<HSE>lohiym<PAS> h<YET>w*' yi<SIL>h@yE<MUN>h l@`w^olA<ZQP>m `AlAyw<PAS> 'e<MUN>yn l@hw^osi<ZQP>yp w*mim*E<TIP>n*w* 'e<MUN>yn lig@ro<ATN>`a w@hA<SIL>'<HSE>lohi<MUN>ym `AWA<ZQP>h SEy*i<SIL>r@'<TIP>w* mil*@pAnA<SIL>yw:
mah=W/*.E<SIL>hAyAh<PAS> k*@bA<MUN>r h<ZQP>w*' wa<SIL>'<HPA>SE<MER>r li<SIL>h@y<TIP>w^ot k*@bA<MUN>r hAyA<ATN>h w@hA<SIL>'<HSE>lohi<TIP>ym y@baq*e<MER>S 'Et=nir@d*A<SIL>p:
w@`<MER>w^od rA'i<TIP>ytiy t*a<MUN>xat haW/*.A<ATN>mES m@q<MEH>w^om ham*iS@p*AT<PAS> SA<MUN>m*Ah hArE<ZQP>Sa` w*m@q<MER>w^om haY*E<TIP>dEq SA<MER>m*Ah hArA<SIL>Sa`:
